text.section: Each person subject to taxation under this subtitle shall make a declaration of its estimated tax if the person's total tax for the current taxable year reasonably is expected to exceed $1,000.

A person required to make a declaration of estimated tax shall:
file with the Commissioner:
an initial declaration of estimated tax on or before April 15 of the taxable year; and
a quarterly estimated tax report on or before June 15, September 15, and December 15 after filing the initial declaration; and
pay to the Commissioner at least 25% of the tax estimated for the full taxable year with the initial declaration for that year and with each quarterly report for that year.
